definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Actual practice is the sole criterion for judging truth (item from Deng Xiaoping theory, from 1978)
pinyin: shi2 jian4 shi4 jian3 yan4 zhen1 li3 de5 wei2 yi1 biao1 zhun3
containing_words.word: 實踐是檢驗真理的唯一標準

sentences.english: Muddy grass and tiny gray mounds of melting snow.
sentences.chinese: 草上粘滿泥污，唯唯一的灰色小雪堆正在溶化。

sentences.english: The only thing one can write that is a bit serious—a love letter.
sentences.chinese: 唯一我們能夠寫的就是一板正經的情書。

sentences.english: You've the only person that Imet here.
sentences.chinese: 你是我在這兒遇見的唯一的一個人。

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿邊境活躍的唯一非停火武裝是南撣邦軍701部隊。

sentences.english: The only difference is that government's shares would be nonvoting until the government sold the shares at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的區別就在於政府在出售股票之前不具有表決權。

sentences.english: Kaifeng City is the only one strong sales of the quality of the machine tools company.
sentences.chinese: 是開封市唯一一家銷售質量過硬的機械工具的公司。

sentences.english: Can a first cousin at one remove inherit the property?
sentences.chinese: 在堂表兄弟姐妹這一輩當中，他是唯一的男孩。

sentences.english: Loveing you, you are my only one.
The only access to the town is across the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 到鎮上唯一的通路是經過那座橋。

sentences.english: The only oddity was the oxygen tanks.
sentences.chinese: 唯一奇怪的就是那些氧氣罐。

sentences.english: For the sphere, that unique geometry is the perfectly spherical sphere.
sentences.chinese: 對於球來說，這個唯一的幾何就是正圓球面。

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 這個聯繫就是全球唯一超級大國面臨的壓力日益增加。

sentences.english: The only oasis of life was in the highlands of Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 生命的唯一綠洲在埃塞俄比亞高原。

sentences.english: The Formosan landlocked salmon is the only salmon to live in a subtropical region.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣的櫻花鉤吻鮭是唯一生活在亞熱帶的鮭魚。

sentences.english: It is a common fallacy to regard school as theonly workshop for the acquisition of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 視學校爲汲取知識的唯一場所是種常見的謬誤。

sentences.english: Former call he now have defiled my only self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 昔日稱兄道弟的他現在竟玷污了我唯一的自尊。

definition: one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
place/location/(after a noun) place where it is located
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
